body_html:
Hi,

The inplace function Zoneout() in dropout.py expects current_input, previous_input in this order. But the zoneout() function in functional.py sends previous_input first. Is this an error?

Also, I think in the documentation of Zoneout module, when wrapping GRUCell, the line

h, h_prev = rnn(input[i], h_prev), h

should be:

h, h_prev = rnn(input[i], h), h

should be:

body:
Hi,

The inplace function Zoneout() in dropout.py expects current_input, previous_input in this order. But the zoneout() function in functional.py sends previous_input first. Is this an error?

Also, I think in the documentation of Zoneout module, when wrapping GRUCell, the line

h, h_prev = rnn(input[i], h_prev), h

should be:

h, h_prev = rnn(input[i], h), h
